contents.text: Larry and Deb are talking about their expenses in the living-room
contents.text_zh: 拉里和戴比正在客厅讨论他们的花费问题。

contents.text: Hey, Deb, let't go to a movie. I could really go for a good comedy Besides, you've been working on these bills for hours now.
contents.text_zh: 嗨，戴比，我们看电影去吧。我真的喜欢看喜剧。再说，这些单子你已经算了好几个小时了。

contents.text: We can't afford to go out.
Haven't I been telling you that we can barely make ends meet? Everything I say goes in one ear and out the other.
contents.text_zh: 我不是一直在告诉你们几乎入不敷出了吗？我说的所有事情你都是左耳进，右耳出。

contents.text: All right. Listen; give me a break, huh? I've been shutting off the lights when I leave the room; I've been keeping track of all of our phone bills...
contents.text_zh: 好啦，听着，等等，好不好？近来我一直都试图削减开支，我离家时总是关灯，我一直随时关心话费。。。。

contents.text: Well maybe, but you've been turning up the beat to 70F evet day and tat's been costing us an additional $70 to $80 a month.
contents.text_zh: 是的，也许是的，但是你每天总是把温度开到70度，这样我们每月得多花70到80美元。

contents.text: Now wait. Now wait. I've had to do that. You know I get sick every single time the temperature goes below 68F. Deb, you know that.
contents.text_zh: 等一等，等一等，我不得不这样做。你知道每次温度低于68度我就会不舒服，戴比，你是知道的。

contents.text: Oh, oh. Look at this telephone bill! It's for $98! That's impossible! I know we've been making some long distance calls lately, but this is riduculous!
contents.text_zh: 噢，噢！看看话费单，花了98美元！怎么可能！我知道近来我们打了些长途，但这个数目也太离谱了。

contents.text: Well, what are the local charges?
Um, the local usage charge comes to $18.50. That's what it's been running lately. Hey, have you been making calls to Edison, New Jersey?
contents.text_zh: 嗯，本地话费是18.5美元，那是最近的话费，嘿，你总是在给新泽西的爱迪生打电话，是吗？

contents.text: Oh, yeah. I did make one call there last month.
contents.text_zh: 噢，是的。我上月的确打了一次电话。

contents.text: Well, they charged us for five calls?
contents.text_zh: 可他们收了我们5次话费？

contents.text: Mm-mm. I'll have to call them and have them straighten it out?
contents.text_zh: 嗯，我得打电话给他们，让他们改正过来。
